price: Mereka menjawab, "Kami mendapat nasib yang malang disebabkan oleh kamu dan orang-orang yang bersamamu." Dia (Saleh) berkata, "Nasibmu ada pada Allah (bukan kami yang menjadi sebab), tetapi kamu adalah kaum yang sedang diuji."
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū iṭṭayyarnā bika wabiman maʿaka qāla ṭāirukum ʿinda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanūna
translations: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen
